entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Parent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:09 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 46 in the evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
